rule:
The output must contain at least three

tags.
input: Apples are nutritious. Bananas are a good source of energy. Oranges are rich in vitamins.
output:
```html

Apples are nutritious.

Bananas are a good source of energy.

Oranges are rich in vitamins.

```
evaluation:
The chatbot output includes three sentences wrapped in

tags, which satisfies the requirement of having at least three

tags. Each

tag contains one tag and at least one tag, fulfilling the requirement to emphasize key words and phrases within each sentence. As these conditions are met, the output complies with the chatbot description. No violation. OK
